locations.street: 3580 Lake Shore RdPark & beach offering sunset views
locations.content: Solé Sand Bar at Woodlawn Beach may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … a cut up pop can to avoid one of our kids stepping on it.  The shower/bathrooms were very dirty right down to a used lad on the floor in the changing area. There were people changing out the garbages on the Beach and a very attentive life …

… have a Beach Bar also! Well kept place that had people eating dinner on the Beach. Huge windmills right on the water. The Bathrooms smelled terrible & reeking of Urine. Shower area was normal. I'll come back very soon though for a day trip!

… our son's wedding reception. Very clean bathrooms where the reception was but the public bathroom was disgusting. I felt like I needed a shower after I used the bathroom. This is the only reason I gave it 4 stars. Someone should be on staff …

There is a small gift shop, large washrooms, a bar at the entrance. Washroom is clean enough, and has change and shower area. Relatively clean water, large area of beach, with windmills insight. There are actually lifeguards on duty, and …

… lifeguard stands so you feel safe. Its a bit of a hike from the parking area, but is handicap accessable. The main casino area has a small restaurant but can be closed to the public if a function is happening there. ( wedding, shower, etc)
The water was very dirty when we went to the shower and undressed there were sticks and dirt all over our bodies not the usual bodies were just about covered with dirt and sticks

… look like they haven't been cleaned in weeks. Random people's body hair collects in the shower drain and the the basins look like they haven't been scrubbed in weeks. In addition, the lockers hadther undetermined particles layering the …

… cold in the locker room.  Floors are dirty. Half the paper towel machines don't work for cleaning equipment. Handicap shower in men's locker room has been broken for months.  It's a decent gym. But doesn't compare to other planet fitnesses.

The locker room is TRASH compared to the other facilities in the buffalo area. The other locations have a private changing space for each individual shower. You can have your phone with you.. products for the shower with you in a dry place. …

showerReviews.reviewText: … a cut up pop can to avoid one of our kids stepping on it.  The shower/bathrooms were very dirty right down to a used lad on the floor in the changing area. There were people changing out the garbages on the Beach and a very attentive life …

… have a Beach Bar also! Well kept place that had people eating dinner on the Beach. Huge windmills right on the water. The Bathrooms smelled terrible & reeking of Urine. Shower area was normal. I'll come back very soon though for a day trip!

… our son's wedding reception. Very clean bathrooms where the reception was but the public bathroom was disgusting. I felt like I needed a shower after I used the bathroom. This is the only reason I gave it 4 stars. Someone should be on staff …

There is a small gift shop, large washrooms, a bar at the entrance. Washroom is clean enough, and has change and shower area. Relatively clean water, large area of beach, with windmills insight. There are actually lifeguards on duty, and …

… lifeguard stands so you feel safe. Its a bit of a hike from the parking area, but is handicap accessable. The main casino area has a small restaurant but can be closed to the public if a function is happening there. ( wedding, shower, etc)
The water was very dirty when we went to the shower and undressed there were sticks and dirt all over our bodies not the usual bodies were just about covered with dirt and sticks

locations.content: Buffalo Marriott at LECOM HARBORCENTER may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Rooms are starting to look a bit worn down, not that same fresh, new, clean feeling it had when I started staying years ago. Gym is way too small for the hotel size, and very often doesn't accommodate the amount of folks looking to use it …

I always suggest this hotel when I have colleagues in town, visiting for leisure or business. The location itself and surrounding area have improved significantly in recent years. The view from the hotel is great too. Always enough parking in the attached ramp. Rooms are clean and reasonably well-appointed.

I was quite disappointed with the cleanliness of the bathroom during my stay. It clearly hadn’t been cleaned thoroughly—there were visible stains and the overall hygiene was not up to Marriott standards. I expected better attention to detail and cleanliness from a brand like Marriott. Hope this can be improved for future guests.

Room was lovely, spacious. Staff is top-notch: professional,  friendly, helpful. Only downside is deeper clean in roo s needed, e.g., lamp shades so dusty... Need room give housekeeping staff more time to do through cleaning.
